channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Woman fumes at 'crazy' bill as restaurant asks for huge service charge
item.description: A woman was left fuming after being handed a 'crazy' bill from a restaurant - with people branding the service charge 'inflated' and 'squeezing the cu...

item.title: Police across US given new UFO handbook as they ‘pose significant safety risks’
item.description: The document was created to protect officers from the 'unknown threat they may pose.'

item.title: 'Ban on keeping beer cold will kill off my award-winning pub'
item.description: Landlord Simon Bull claims a single noise complaint is stopping him from using a cooling unit to keep his drinks icy cold and putting the future of hi...

item.title: Croissant-shaped lamp bought on Temu turns out to be an actual croissant
item.description: 'The ants were going in the hole,' she explained. 'So I just poked a bigger hole.'

item.title: North-South split emerges in grim report into opportunities for young people
item.description: The annual state of the nation report from the government's Social Mobility Commission highlights stark regional divides that experts warned 'scar our...

item.title: World’s oldest whale found with 100-year-old harpoon in its side
item.description: ‘He couldn't have been that bothered if he lived for another 100 years.’

item.title: Do you agree with Piers Morgan saying Harry & Meghan are 'spoilt brats'? Take our poll
item.description: Piers Morgan has slammed Prince Harry and Meghan Markle for what he calls 'upstaging' Kate Middleton and Prince William with their Netflix announcemen...

item.title: Cat makes history by becoming first feline to complete Three Peaks Challenge
item.description: Louis has become the first feline in history to conquer the legendary hiking challenge.

item.title: Rampaging otters leave female jogger crying in a pool of blood
item.description: The jogger, who was wearing leggings, was bitten by the otters who were looking for food in Tanjung Aru Recreation Park, in Sabah, Malaysia
